Package de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.webapp.page.annotation.component

Wicket component used for AnnotationPage

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationLayersModalPanel
    A panel used by AnnotationPage CurationPage and CorrectionPage consisting of a link to open ModalWindow to set AnnotationPreference
    DocumentNamePanel
    A Panel which contains a Label to display document name as concatenations of Project.getName() and SourceDocument.getName()
    ExportModalPanel
    A panel used for AnnotationPage CurationPage and CorrectionPage consisting of a link to export annotated data
    FinishImage
    show closed/not closed images on annoataion/correction pages
    FinishLink
    A link to close/finish annotation/correction/curation project
    GuidelineModalPanel
    A panel used by AnnotationPage CurationPage and CorrectionPage consisting of a link to open annotation guideline
